page.title: 06My Holiday In Spain.
page.content:
We left for Gatwick at 5.45 am and on arrival we had to show our passports and load our cases onto the plane. We got on the plane at 9.15 am and it was brilliant.It was a Boeing 737.
We touched down at Ryde airport at 10.30 and headed for Santo Susana.
As soon as we had unpacked we ran downstairs and into the swimming pool.
The best night was when we went to 'Charlie Chaplin's' for a meal,thento a disco called 'The Tropical'.
Another night we went to a medieval night and had a roast meal and wine from a jug.
Steven Beckwith,age 12
